conversationTexts.speaker: Lucy
conversationTexts.text: Hello, welcome to Meow Cafe! Is this your first visit with us?

conversationTexts.speaker: Marcus
conversationTexts.text: Yes, it's my first time here. I've heard a lot about your place.

conversationTexts.speaker: Lucy
conversationTexts.text: I’m glad to hear that! What brings you in today?

conversationTexts.speaker: Marcus
conversationTexts.text: I'm considering adoption. I spend most of my time writing, and I thought a feline companion might make a nice muse.

conversationTexts.speaker: Lucy
conversationTexts.text: We do have a cat who might just fit you. His name is Phantom. He is quite calm, curious and loves being with company.

conversationTexts.speaker: Marcus
conversationTexts.text: Phantom, huh? That name alone already seems like a good fit. Where can I see him?

conversationTexts.speaker: Lucy
conversationTexts.text: He usually hangs out by the window. He loves looking outside while lounging on his cushion.

conversationTexts.speaker: Marcus
conversationTexts.text: That sounds great. Thank you for the recommendation.

conversationTexts.speaker: Julia
conversationTexts.text: Hi Lucy, I'm Julia from the yoga studio down the street. I've been thinking about adding a friendly feline to our space.

conversationTexts.speaker: Lucy
conversationTexts.text: Hello Julia! That sounds like a fantastic idea. What kind of cat are you looking for?

conversationTexts.speaker: Julia
conversationTexts.text: Well, I need a cat that's playful and adventurous. Someone who is not afraid of being around people.

conversationTexts.speaker: Lucy
conversationTexts.text: I have just the right cat for you. Let me introduce you to Lotus. She’s very sociable and loves attention.

conversationTexts.speaker: Julia
conversationTexts.text: Lotus sounds like she could be a wonderful addition. Can I meet her?
